title: Artificial Stars featuring bloop blop
description: July 18th come see Artificial Stars rock the house! Bloop blop will open the night at 8pm. Tickets are $5 at the door.

title: Artificial Stars featuring shmoople moops
description: On July 24th traveling band shmoople moops will be stopping by to rock the house! Artifical Stars will open up the show at 9pm. Show is FREE!!

title: Jam night hosted by Artifical Stars
description: Artificial Stars will be hosting Jam Night this week. Get down here early to sign up!.
